title: The Wisdom of Charlie Thomas: A Heroic Week
summary: Charlie Thomas, a retired teacher, discovers he can transfer wisdom telepathically over one week, changing lives in his community.
summaryGerman: Charlie Thomas, ein pensionierter Lehrer, entdeckt, dass er eine Woche lang telepathisch Weisheit übertragen kann, was das Leben in seiner Gemeinschaft verändert.
summaryDutch: Charlie Thomas, een gepensioneerde leraar, ontdekt dat hij gedurende een week wijsheid telepathisch kan overdragen, waardoor hij levens in zijn gemeenschap verandert.
summaryFrench: Charlie Thomas, un enseignant à la retraite, découvre qu'il peut transférer la sagesse télépathiquement pendant une semaine, changeant la vie dans sa communauté.

story.text: Charlie Thomas, feeling a mysterious surge in energy, inadvertently transfers profound historical knowledge to a struggling student.
Amazed by yesterday's event, Charlie experiments and successfully helps another, feeling an incredible sense of purpose.
Charlie's tutoring session turns into a heartfelt discussion about life values, bonding deeply with his pupils.
News of Charlie's unique ability spreads, and he addresses a crowd, inspiring future leaders with his wisdom.
Feeling the strain of his new powers, Charlie decides to limit his sessions but remains determined to help as many as possible.
Charlie mentors a young entrepreneur, imparting essential business ethics, revitalizing both their spirits.
Reflection leads to realization as Charlie prepares for the week ahead, aware of the positive impact he holds.

moral: The true power of a superhero lies not in their strength, but in their ability to empower others.
